overview:
Dan peters is a Local Marketing Consultant that shows small business owners the process of continuing to market your site to new prospective customers. You can find these types of information about local online marketing and other technique that allows you to consistently and reliably get new customers and increase sales for your small business.

Complete Local Marketing Source For Local Search Marketing Online And Advertising Guide For Local Internet Marketing Consulting Services. Teach How To Get New Customers For Your Clients With Local Internet Marketing.
